text:
I have given Citibank a very bad review in the past because of the non-existent customer service during covid-19 and after that.

I have closed my account except citi visa card.  Recently, we are all force to convert to e-statement, i.e., every so often they will reset to e-statement and customers have to waste time resetting  it back. Looks like citi is increasingly anti-business. Since citi has sold the retail business, you might as well close you credit card business. There is no short of credit card alternatives in Singapore.

The staff here are friendly and helpful, efficiently assisting me with my matter. However, I was initially confused about the bank's location, as it is situated on the 22nd floor of the office building rather than within the shopping mall itself.
